name: Azurite
description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Azurite is one of those gems.

name: Shroomstone
description: Origin of the Shroomstone is unknown, hence its low value. It has a very high shine and 12 sides, however.

name: Sushi stones
description: Sushi stones are our most coveted and sought after gem. You will pay much to be the proud owner of this gorgeous and high shine gem.
